role_definition: This supports consumer initiated securities investment and trading activity for their self-managed securities investments. Trades will typically be blocked/netted against the bank's own securities position for subsequent market execution. Quotes/prices are based on the prevailing price at the time of the customer instruction to trade
example_of_use: An consumer initiates a securities purchase for their investment portfolio, providing funds from their linked 'trading' current account
executive_summary: Handle the consumer front-end trading requests. These will typically be blocked/netted for market execution
key_features: Initiate market order for consumer customer
